languages.text: "Я молю Бога-Императора, чтобы под главенством Инцендии Чорда Футфол прошел через все выпавшие ему испытания и очистился, восстав к жизни обновленным".
"I pray to the God-Emperor that under Incendia Chorda's rule, Footfall will pass all the trials it must face and emerge purified, resurrected to a new life."
languages.original_text: "Я молю Бога-Императора, чтобы под главенством Инцендии Чорда Футфол прошел через все выпавшие ему испытания и очистился, восстав к жизни обновленным".

traits.locale_text: "I pray to the God-Emperor that under Incendia Chorda's rule, Footfall will pass all the trials it must face and emerge purified, resurrected to a new life."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我向神皇祈祷，希望落脚港能在因森蒂娅·库尔达的统治下，通过所有必将面对的审判，由此得到净化，获得新生。”
languages.original_text: "I pray to the God-Emperor that under Incendia Chorda's rule, Footfall will pass all the trials it must face and emerge purified, resurrected to a new life."

traits.locale_text: “我向神皇祈祷，希望落脚港能在因森蒂娅·库尔达的统治下，通过所有必将面对的审判，由此得到净化，获得新生。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je prie l'Empereur-Dieu pour que Castel, sous l'égide d'Incendia Chorda, relève les défis qui l'attendent et parvienne à se sortir purifié de cette épreuve, prêt à entamer une nouvelle vie. »
languages.original_text: "I pray to the God-Emperor that under Incendia Chorda's rule, Footfall will pass all the trials it must face and emerge purified, resurrected to a new life."

traits.locale_text: « Je prie l'Empereur-Dieu pour que Castel, sous l'égide d'Incendia Chorda, relève les défis qui l'attendent et parvienne à se sortir purifié de cette épreuve, prêt à entamer une nouvelle vie. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Rezo al Dios Emperador para que, bajo el gobierno de Incendia Chorda, Paso supere sus pruebas y emerja purificado, resucitado con nueva vida».
languages.original_text: "I pray to the God-Emperor that under Incendia Chorda's rule, Footfall will pass all the trials it must face and emerge purified, resurrected to a new life."

traits.locale_text: «Rezo al Dios Emperador para que, bajo el gobierno de Incendia Chorda, Paso supere sus pruebas y emerja purificado, resucitado con nueva vida».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「神帝陛下に祈ろう。インセンディア・チョーダの支配下で、フットフォールは直面するすべての試練を通過し、浄化され、新たによみがえることを」
languages.original_text: "I pray to the God-Emperor that under Incendia Chorda's rule, Footfall will pass all the trials it must face and emerge purified, resurrected to a new life."

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下に祈ろう。インセンディア・チョーダの支配下で、フットフォールは直面するすべての試練を通過し、浄化され、新たによみがえることを」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bete zum Gottimperator, dass Footfall unter der Herrschaft von Incendia Chorda alle Prüfungen besteht und geläutert daraus hervorgeht, mit einem neuen Leben gesegnet."
languages.original_text: "I pray to the God-Emperor that under Incendia Chorda's rule, Footfall will pass all the trials it must face and emerge purified, resurrected to a new life."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bete zum Gottimperator, dass Footfall unter der Herrschaft von Incendia Chorda alle Prüfungen besteht und geläutert daraus hervorgeht, mit einem neuen Leben gesegnet."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I pray to the God-Emperor that under Incendia Chorda's rule, Footfall will pass all the trials it must face and emerge purified, resurrected to a new life."

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator'a dualar ediyorum... İncendia Chorda'nın hükmü altında Binliman, karşısına çıkan tüm imtihanları tamamlasın ve saflıkla yeni bir başlangıca hazır olsun."
languages.original_text: "I pray to the God-Emperor that under Incendia Chorda's rule, Footfall will pass all the trials it must face and emerge purified, resurrected to a new life."

traits.locale_text: "Tanrı İmparator'a dualar ediyorum, İncendia Chorda'nın hükmü altında Binliman karşısına çıkan tüm imtihanları tamamlasın ve saf, yepyeni bir hayata yeniden başlasın."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
